main event: Multiple silver objects observed in formation, resembling parachute canopies, in Las Vegas on April 26, 1964.
interesting points: The objects flew at about 30-40 degrees elevation,The formation comprised 12-15 objects,The objects displayed a flight pattern similar to that of a bunch of bees,The sighting lasted for approximately 2 minutes,The sighting occurred during daylight and the objects disappeared to the north.
witness description: Mr. G. S., an engineer for Westinghouse
